title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.4 - Telephones restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.4 - Telephones restricted

State Regulations
(a) No
telephone shall be installed in the stable area or elsewhere upon its grounds
except with the permission of the licensed quarter horse track. (b) The licensed association conducting the
meeting shall be responsible for the enforcement of this section. Violation of
this section shall subject the offending person to the removal of the telephone
and to action by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4210.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
